overview:
As CEO of playence, Sinuhe Arroyo is responsible for the sales, marketing and finance of the company. Prior to joining playence, Sinuhe worked as Corporate Development Manager at phion AG. While at phion, Sinuhe completed the acquisition of Visonys AG and successfully established new business partnerships internationally. Prior to phion he worked at DERI as project manager, participating in various world-class research projects that sat the foundations of Semantic Technology and acquiring various million Euros in funding. Prior to DERI Sinuhe worked at iSOCO S.A., contributing, already in 2002, to one of the first commercial Semantic Web projects world-wide. Sinuhe brings more than 10 years of technology industry experience and extensive business and operational background to playence.

Sinuhe holds a PhD in Computer Science (Semantic Technology) from the University of Innsbruck, Austria.
